name: Falcomaster3000 Ep. 1
description:
The year is 20XX . . . Competitive gaming has collapsed,
so all we have now is: Rock, paper, scissors.

But archives speak of a lone Smasher who will come back, 
to save us all, from a terrible future.

a BRISK and CONCENTRATED visual-novel experience:
  • 30 - 40 minutes long.

     ♪   Interactive rhythm gameplay.

  • Combines motion graphics and detailed 2D animation.
    ♫  Fully voice-acted and musically scored. 
  • The result of a full year of development!
 Developer Website
